WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

i see in Rawr only Items up to 509. The Current Items are up to 541. Also i have no Filter for Thron of Thunder (T15).

An Item Cache Reset / All Cache Reset will not help. 

Whar must i do, for correcting Itemlists?

Thanks Tarantulas

Comments.Message:
Your only options at the moment are (1) wait for 5.0.6 or later, or (2) going to Options -> Edit Items, clicking Add, and manually entering the Item id number (can be found on Wowhead in the URL) for *each* item you want to add.

That said, updating the Item Cache for 5.2 is one of our top priorities.

This is a work in progress, as Omniaa noted.  The next release should contain the new gear, and I'm working as fast as I can - unfortunately, there are only so many hours in a day, and not all of them can be spent on Rawr.

Thanks, for the answer.

For your Information, it's possible, the next Release (5.3) will be rollout at next week. Current, i'am unknown, if it gives new Items.

For me intressting, how work's the Updateting Item Cache? Is this a manuell process?
If this a manuell process, why use not the api to get all Items from wowhead/buffed/speedydragon?
So the work for Updating will be smaller.

I know, programming need many hours. I will say you, you has my respect.

Regards Tarantulas

I have been working on an automatic way for the developers to update the item cache, but there will always be some manual steps.  As you noted, this work is somewhat time consuming, but it should make further item cache updates for future content tiers smaller.
